name: Scythe of Vyse
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

descriptions.name: Hex
descriptions.description: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.Instantly destroys illusions.Range: 800

notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
